participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily finds solace in her own company and values deep connections with others.
participant_1.background: Pink is my favorite color. I enjoy being alone. My mother is dead. I am a yoga instructor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and hard-working, Jake enjoys the camaraderie of teamwork but also appreciates moments of solitude.
participant_2.background: I am a roofer. I always have a beer after work. I played football in high school. I drive a lifted chevy truck. My favorite food is steak cooked well done.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a roofer.
Really? That sounds like a tough job.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
What's your favorite thing about it?
I like being outside and working with my hands.
I can see that. Do you like to work alone or with other people?
I like both. I like working alone when I need to focus, but I also like working with other people when we're doing a big project.
What's your favorite thing about being a roofer?
I like the feeling of accomplishment I get when I finish a job.
I can see that. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play football. I played in high school and I still like to play in a recreational league.
That's cool. I used to play football in high school too.
What position did you play?
I was a running back.
That's awesome. I was a linebacker.
I bet you were a tough linebacker.
I like to think so.
What was your favorite football memory?
My favorite memory was when we won the state championship my senior year.
That's amazing. I bet that was a great feeling.
It was. It was the best feeling in the world.
